ApexSettings.name: ApexSettings
ApexSettings.label: Apex Settings
ApexSettings.description: Represents ApexSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableAggregateCodeCoverageOnly.description: enable Aggregate Code Coverage Only field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableApexAccessRightsPref.description: enable Apex Access Rights Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableApexApprovalLockUnlock.description: enable Apex Approval Lock Unlock field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableApexCtrlImplicitWithSharingPref.description: enable Apex Ctrl Implicit With Sharing Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableApexPropertyGetterPref.description: enable Apex Property Getter Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableAuraApexCtrlAuthUserAccessCheckPre.description: enable Aura Apex Ctrl Auth User Access Check Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableAuraApexCtrlGuestUserAccessCheckPr.description: enable Aura Apex Ctrl Guest User Access Check Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableCompileOnDeploy.description: enable Compile On Deploy field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableDisableParallelApexTesting.description: enable Disable Parallel Apex Testing field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableDoNotEmailDebugLog.description: enable Do Not Email Debug Log field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableGaplessTestAutoNum.description: enable Gapless Test Auto Num field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableMngdCtrlActionAccessPref.description: enable Mngd Ctrl Action Access Pref field of ApexSettings metadata component.

enableNonCertifiedApexMdCrud.description: enable Non Certified Apex Md Crud field of ApexSettings metadata component.
